News.Title: Exxaro Tiles Gets Board Approval to Set Up Dubai Subsidiary for Tiles Trading
News.Summary: Exxaro Tiles Limited's Board of Directors has approved the incorporation of a Foreign Wholly Owned Subsidiary (WOS) in Dubai to undertake trading activities for all types of tiles. The company will provide updates to exchanges upon occurrence of the event as per SEBI regulations.

News.Title: Exxaro Tiles Appoints Jigneshkumar B. Patel as New CFO
News.Summary: Exxaro Tiles has appointed Mr. Jigneshkumar B. Patel as its new Chief Financial Officer. Patel brings experience from his previous role as Deputy Manager at Asian Granito India.

News.Title: Deep Diamond India Acquires 5.87% Stake in Exxaro Tiles Through Open Market Purchases
News.Summary: Deep Diamond India Limited purchased 2,62,72,073 equity shares of Exxaro Tiles Limited through stock exchange transactions between October 16 and November 11, 2025, increasing its total shareholding to 5.87% of the company's issued share capital. The acquisition was conducted through open market purchases and disclosed under SEBI substantial acquisition regulations to stock exchanges and the target company.

News.Title: Exxaro Tiles Denies False Claims in Social Media Video, Clarifies Solar Project Details
News.Summary: Exxaro Tiles Limited has denied false and misleading claims made in a YouTube video by channel Jasmeet Singhrao. The company categorically rejected claims about annual savings of ₹30 crore from solar energy, significant entry into UAE and Saudi Arabia markets, 1000% profit growth expectations, and appointment of Ajay Devgn as brand ambassador. The company clarified that it has a 5MW DC solar power project at Gorol, Idar, Gujarat, with expected annual savings of approximately ₹5.67 crore in electricity costs. The project aims to meet electricity requirements of their Talod manufacturing plant through captive consumption. Exxaro confirmed that Ajay Devgn was appointed as brand ambassador in May 2022. The company stated no other projects, expansions, or endorsements as claimed in the video are being undertaken. Exxaro is taking appropriate action against the unauthorized video and reporting it to the social media platform.

News.Title: Exxaro Tiles Reports Net Loss in Q2 FY2026 Results
News.Summary: Exxaro Tiles Limited announced its unaudited financial results for the quarter and half-year ended September 30, 2025. The company reported a standalone net loss of ₹3.67 lakhs for the quarter compared to a loss of ₹4.52 lakhs in the previous quarter. On a consolidated basis, the net loss was ₹9.77 lakhs for the quarter versus ₹80.94 lakhs profit in the previous quarter. For the half-year period, standalone loss stood at ₹8.19 lakhs while consolidated loss was ₹200.71 lakhs. The company operates in manufacturing and trading of refractory ceramic products (vitrified tiles). Total assets on standalone basis were ₹47,893.78 lakhs as of September 30, 2025. The results were reviewed by the Audit Committee and approved by the Board of Directors at their meeting held on November 8, 2025.

News.Title: Exxaro Tiles CFO Himanshu Shah Resigns to Pursue New Opportunity
News.Summary: Exxaro Tiles Limited announced the resignation of Chief Financial Officer Himanshu Shah, effective September 6, 2025. Shah submitted his resignation letter on August 7, 2025, citing his decision to pursue a new professional opportunity outside the organization. The company confirmed there are no other material reasons for his resignation beyond those stated. Shah served as a Key Managerial Person in his role as CFO.

News.Title: Exxaro Tiles Re-appoints Kamal Dave as Independent Director for Second Five-Year Term
News.Summary: Exxaro Tiles Limited's Board of Directors approved the re-appointment of Mr. Kamal Dave as Independent Director for a second term of five consecutive years, from January 5, 2026 to January 4, 2031. The re-appointment is subject to shareholder approval at the upcoming 18th Annual General Meeting. Dave, aged 46, has been associated with the company since 2021 and is a practicing Chartered Accountant with 12 years of experience in accounts and finance. He operates as sole proprietor of M/s. Kamal Dave and Co. since 2009 and is a member of the Institute of Chartered Accountants of India. The appointment was based on recommendations from the Nomination and Remuneration Committee.

News.Title: Exxaro Tiles Reports Q2 2025 Results, Reappoints Independent Director, Schedules AGM
News.Summary: Exxaro Tiles Limited announced its unaudited financial results for the quarter ended June 30, 2025. On a standalone basis, the company reported revenue from operations of Rs. 5,315.52 lakhs compared to Rs. 5,583.30 lakhs in the same quarter last year. The company posted a net profit of Rs. 49.56 lakhs for the quarter versus a loss of Rs. 426.53 lakhs in the corresponding period last year. On a consolidated basis, revenue from operations stood at Rs. 6,492.53 lakhs with a net profit of Rs. 80.94 lakhs compared to a loss of Rs. 423.55 lakhs in the previous year quarter. The Board approved the reappointment of Mr. Kamal Dave as Independent Director for a second term of five years from January 5, 2026, to January 4, 2031, subject to shareholder approval. The company scheduled its 18th Annual General Meeting for September 27, 2025, to be held virtually at 11:00 AM IST. The cut-off date for voting and attending the AGM is September 20, 2025.
